iconv.h¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

IO

Description:

Declares functions related to the I/O character set conversion.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Typedef Name

Description

iconv_t

typedef void *

Type of the character set conversion descriptor.

Description

iconv_t

size_t

Converts a character set.

Closes a character set conversion descriptor.
